headline: Nordson's Growth Strategy: Acquisitions, Tariffs, And The Investment Case
summary: Nordson shows steady profitability & cash flow but relies on acquisitions for growth. Discover why its stock valuation lacks a margin of safety. Read why NDSN is a hold.
